------=_Part_336921_1425757815.1423195594466
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi,I had already posted my questions earlier regarding the issues that I have been facing the deduplication.
Can you please let me know if this is the correct forum where I should post my questions ?

I am trying to achieve incremental crawling using Heritrix 3.2.0.However it seems it is always browsing all the URL's even if there is no change.I am attaching crawler-beans.xml for the configuration that I am doing.Can anyone suggest what I might be doing wrong ?
Is the spring bean I have put the configurations for both   
   - URL-Agnostic Duplication Reduction   

   - Legacy Duplication Reduction Configuration   

Can I use both the features at the same time in the config ? I see the archive size remains the same across multiple crawls even if there is no change . How do I check if the the deduplication is working ?
Any help will be greatly appreciated as I am desperately tryinjg to get this work :)




ThanksSandip Dev
